<li id="cite_note-528"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-528">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.imda.gov.sg/industry-development/infrastructure/next-gen-national-infocomm-infrastructure/singapore-internet-exchange" rel="nofollow">"Singapore Internet Exchange"</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Info-communications_Media_Development_Authority" title="Info-communications Media Development Authority">Info-communications Media Development Authority</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">4 July</span> 2018</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Singapore+Internet+Exchange&amp;rft.pub=Info-communications+Media+Development+Authority&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.imda.gov.sg%2Findustry-development%2Finfrastructure%2Fnext-gen-national-infocomm-infrastructure%2Fsingapore-internet-exchange&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASingapore"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-sandfort-529"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-sandfort_529-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-sandfort_529-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation magazine cs1" id="CITEREFSandfort1993">Sandfort, Sandy (April 1993). <a class="external text" href="https://www.wired.com/1993/04/sandfort/" rel="nofollow">"The Intelligent Island"</a>. <i>Wired</i>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Wired&amp;rft.atitle=The+Intelligent+Island&amp;rft.date=1993-04&amp;rft.aulast=Sandfort&amp;rft.aufirst=Sandy&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wired.com%2F1993%2F04%2Fsandfort%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASingapore"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-530"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-530">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation magazine cs1" id="CITEREFGibson1993">Gibson, William (April 1993). <a class="external text" href="https://www.wired.com/1993/04/gibson-2/" rel="nofollow">"Disneyland with the Death Penalty"</a>. <i>Wired</i>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Wired&amp;rft.atitle=Disneyland+with+the+Death+Penalty&amp;rft.date=1993-04&amp;rft.aulast=Gibson&amp;rft.aufirst=William&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wired.com%2F1993%2F04%2Fgibson-2%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASingapore"></span></span>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading">Further reading</span></h2>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1054258005" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="refbegin refbegin-columns references-column-width" style="column-width: 30em">
<ul><li>Abshire, Jean. <i>The History of Singapore</i> (ABC-CLIO, 2011).</li>
<li>Barr, Michael D. <i>Singapore: A Modern History</i> (2019)</li>
<li>Corfield, Justin J. <i>Historical dictionary of Singapore</i> (2011) <a class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/historicaldictio0000corf" rel="nofollow">online</a></li>
<li>Ghesquière, Henri C. <i>Singapore's success: engineering economic growth</i> (2007)</li>
<li>Heng, Chye Kiang. <i>50 Years of Urban Planning in Singapore</i> (2016)</li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1">Hill, Michael (1995). <div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Articles_related_to_Singapore" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#e8e8ff;"><div id="Articles_related_to_Singapore" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em">Articles related to Singapore</div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0;font-size:114%"><div style="padding:0px">
<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="25px_Geographic_locale" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#e8e8ff;"><div id="25px_Geographic_locale" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Gnome-globe.svg"><img alt="Gnome-globe.svg" data-file-height="48" data-file-width="48" decoding="async" height="25" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/25px-Gnome-globe.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/38px-Gnome-globe.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/50px-Gnome-globe.svg.png 2x" width="25"/></a><span class="nowrap"> </span>Geographic locale</div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0;font-size:114%"><div style="padding:0px">
<p><b><a href="/wiki/Geographic_coordinate_system" title="Geographic coordinate system">Lat. <small>and</small> Long.</a> <link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1073938472" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><span class="plainlinks nourlexpansion"><a class="external text" href="//geohack.toolforge.org/geohack.php?pagename=Singapore&amp;params=1_22_N_103_48_E_"><span class="geo-default"><span class="geo-dms" title="Maps, aerial photos, and other data for this location"><span class="latitude">1°22′N</span> <span class="longitude">103°48′E</span></span></span><span class="geo-multi-punct">﻿ / ﻿</span><span class="geo-nondefault"><span class="geo-dec" title="Maps, aerial photos, and other data for this location">1.367°N 103.800°E</span><span style="display:none">﻿ / <span class="geo">1.367; 103.800</span></span></span></a></span></b>
</p>

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="English-speaking_world" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:English_official_language_clickable_map" title="Template:English official language clickable map"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:English_official_language_clickable_map" title="Template talk:English official language clickable map"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:English_official_language_clickable_map&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="English-speaking_world" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/English_language#Geographic_distribution" title="English language">English-speaking world</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"><div style="text-align: center;">
<p><i>Click on a coloured area to see an article about English in that country or region</i>

href="/wiki/Youth_Olympic_Games" title="Youth Olympic Games">Youth Olympic Games</a> Host Cities</div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">Summer Youth Olympics</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"><b><a href="/wiki/2010_Summer_Youth_Olympics" title="2010 Summer Youth Olympics">2010</a></b>: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Singapore</a> • <b><a href="/wiki/2014_Summer_Youth_Olympics" title="2014 Summer Youth Olympics">2014</a></b>: <a href="/wiki/Nanjing" title="Nanjing">Nanjing</a> • <b><a href="/wiki/2018_Summer_Youth_Olympics" title="2018 Summer Youth Olympics">2018</a></b>: <a href="/wiki/Buenos_Aires" title="Buenos Aires">Buenos Aires</a> • <i><b><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/2022_Summer_Youth_Olympics" title="2022 Summer Youth Olympics">2022</a></b>: <a href="/wiki/Dakar" title="Dakar">Dakar</a></i></div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">Winter Youth Olympics</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0
